curam.util.resources

Class XMLParserCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • curam.util.resources.XMLParserCache

  • public final class XMLParserCache
extends java.lang.Object
    A thread local cache for XML parsers that are relatively expensive to instantiate.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  XMLParserCache.DBFactory
      Document builder factory.
      static class  XMLParserCache.DBFactoryDefault
      Default implementation of a document builder factory.
      static interface  XMLParserCache.SPFactory
      SAX parser factory.
      static class  XMLParserCache.SPFactoryDefault
      Default implementation of a SAX factory.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XMLParserCache(XMLParserCache.DBFactory dbFactory, XMLParserCache.SPFactory spFactory)
      Use the constructor to build a customized XML parser cache that uses the provided factories to create the cached XML parsers.

    • Constructor Detail

      • XMLParserCache

        public XMLParserCache(XMLParserCache.DBFactory dbFactory,
                      XMLParserCache.SPFactory spFactory)
        Use the constructor to build a customized XML parser cache that uses the provided factories to create the cached XML parsers. WARNING: It is mandated that customized XML Parsers must be configured to protect against XML External Entity (XXE) and Denial of service attacks.
        Parameters:
        dbFactory - a document builder factory
        spFactory - a SAX parser factory

    • Method Detail

      • createSecureXMLReader

        public static org.xml.sax.XMLReader createSecureXMLReader()
        Creates a brand new secure XML reader.
        Returns:
        a new reader.

      • getDocumentBuilderInternal

        public javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilder getDocumentBuilderInternal()
        Use this method to obtain the thread local cached document builder. The document builder is reset just before being returned.
        Returns:
        a cached document builder

      • getDocumentBuilder

        public static javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilder getDocumentBuilder()
        Use this method to obtain the thread local cached document builder. The document builder is reset just before being returned.
        Returns:
        a cached document builder

      • getDocumentBuilder

        public static javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilder getDocumentBuilder(boolean namespaceAware)
        Use this method to obtain the thread local cached document builder set to be namespace aware. The document builder is reset just before being returned.
        Parameters:
        namespaceAware - True if the document builder should be namespace aware.
        Returns:
        a cached document builder.

      • getSAXParserInternal

        public javax.xml.parsers.SAXParser getSAXParserInternal()
        Use this method to obtain the thread local cached SAX parser. The parser is reset just before being returned.
        Invoke the SAXParser.reset() method as soon as you finished using the parser; this reduces the memory footprint of the cached parser.

        Before retrieving a parser directly investigate the parseAndReset static methods of this class - they provide a way to obtain, parse and reset the parser safely in just one operation.

        Returns:
        a cached SAX parser

      • getSAXParser

        public static javax.xml.parsers.SAXParser getSAXParser()
        Use this method to obtain the thread local cached SAX parser. The parser is reset just before being returned.
        Invoke the SAXParser.reset() method as soon as you finished using the parser; this reduces the memory footprint of the cached parser.

        Before retrieving a parser directly investigate the parseAndReset static methods of this class - they provide a way to obtain, parse and reset the parser safely in just one operation.

        Returns:
        a cached SAX parser

        public javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory getDocumentBuilderFactoryInternal()
        Obtain a thread local cached Document builder Factory.
        Returns:
        a cached SAX builder.

        Returns:
        a cached SAX Parser Factory.

      • getSAXBuilderInternal

        public SAXBuilder getSAXBuilderInternal()
        Obtain a thread local cached SAX builder. This builder allows DOCTYPE declarations and should not be used to process XML which can be supplied from external source.
        Returns:
        a cached SAX builder.

      • getSAXBuilderDisallowAllDTDInternal

        public SAXBuilder getSAXBuilderDisallowAllDTDInternal()
        Obtain a thread local cached SAX builder. This builder does not allow DOCTYPE declarations and should be used to process XML which can be supplied from external source.
        Returns:
        a cached SAX builder.

      • getDocBuilderFactory

        public static javax.xml.parsers.DocumentBuilderFactory getDocBuilderFactory()
        Obtain a thread local DocumentBuilderFactory. Should only be used when custom parser configuration is required otherwise use default parser: XMLParserCache.getDocumentBuilder().
        Returns:
        a new secure instance of DocumentBuilderFactory.

      • getSAXParserFactory

        public static javax.xml.parsers.SAXParserFactory getSAXParserFactory()
        Obtain a thread local SAXParserFactory. Should only be used when custom parser configuration is required otherwise use default parser: XMLParserCache.getSaxParser().
        Returns:
        a new secure instance of SAXParserFactory.

      • getSAXBuilder

        public static SAXBuilder getSAXBuilder()
        Obtain a thread local cached SAX builder.This builder allows DOCTYPE declarations and should not be used to process XML which can be supplied from external source.
        Returns:
        a cached SAX builder.

      • getSAXBuilderDisallowAllDTD

        public static SAXBuilder getSAXBuilderDisallowAllDTD()
        Obtain a thread local cached SAX builder.This builder does not allow DOCTYPE declarations and should be used to process XML which is supplied from external source. This builder has the property "http://apache.org/xml/features/disallow-doctype-decl" set to true.
        Returns:
        a cached SAX builder.

        public org.xml.sax.XMLReader getXMLReaderInternal()
        Obtain a thread local cached XML reader.
        Returns:
        a cached XML reader.

        Returns:
        a cached XML reader.

      • checkForXXE

        public static java.io.InputStream checkForXXE(java.io.InputStream source)
                                       throws DOMException,
                                              java.io.IOException
        Method to check if a given XML (as an InputStream) is subject to cause an XXE attack. The method simply tries to parse the given source using a secure SAXBuilder, which will throw an exception if dangerous XML is detected.
        Parameters:
        source - - input XML source.
        Returns:
        InputStream object = a copy of the original InputStream parameter.
        Throws:
        DOMException - throws this if unsupported XXE vulnerable entities are present in the XML.
        java.io.IOException - throws this is there is a problem accessing the file.

      • parseAndResetInternal

        public void parseAndResetInternal(java.io.File f,
                                  org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler dh)
                           throws org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                                  java.io.IOException
        Use this method to parse and reset the parser at the end of the parsing operation.
        Parameters:
        f - the file containing the XML to parse
        dh - the SAX default handler to use
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - when an error occurs
        java.io.IOException - when an error occurs
